title: Strategies to Enhance Self-Directed Science Learning via the Internet

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific theories and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Flexible learning design reflecting the characteristics of office/administrative professionals, utilizing personal device-based environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze practical applications of scientific concepts using the internet with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically document and share scientific problem-solving processes using digital tools.
Learners can exchange feedback with peers using online collaboration tools, improving learning effectiveness by over 30%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
